Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date) }}

To

{{ doc.salutation }}. {{ doc.employee_name }}
{{ doc.designation }}
{{ doc.location }}


Subject: Letter of Promotion

Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

Consequent to the review of your performance, we take great pleasure in promoting you to the post of {{ doc.new_designation }}, w.e.f. {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.effective_date) }}.

All the other terms and conditions remain unchanged as per your Appointment Letter.

We would like to take this opportunity to appreciate your efforts. We are sure you will make the best use of the opportunity offered to you and contribute substantially to the success of our organization as you have done in the past.

Please sign the duplicate copy of this letter as a token of acceptance of the same.


With Best Wishes,
{{ doc.current_user }}
{{ doc.user_role }}



I have received a copy of this letter and have read and understood its contents.

Name: ____________________
Signature: ____________________
Date: ____________________
name: MI Letter of Promotion
